entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:57 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
